import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import mrCash from './assets/images/mrcash.png'; import bubble from './assets/images/bubble.svg'; import button from './assets/images/button.svg'; import './assets/scss/home.scss'; class Home extends React.Component { render() { return (

Sell your car to Mr Cash, hassle-free!

How it works.

1

Enter information about your car

Give us the vin or year, make, model, and trim. Let us know the mileage and condition the cars in. Upload photos for a better offer.

2

Get an instant offer

We'll make you a estimated offer for your car right away! Obligation and hassle free! Within 24hrs we will send you an official offer for your car.

3

Get Paid!

When you accept the offer we can pick up the car and you get paid!

{/*

Get An Instant Offer!

*/}
) } } export default Home;
